fieldDescription: Whether the scoop is enabled by default on game load.
Enable automatic fuel generation while traveling through nebulas.
Enable automatic supply generation while traveling through nebulas.
Percent of max fuel to generate per day.
Soft cap as a percent of max fuel (100 = full, 75 = three-quarters).
Absolute cap on fuel units (0 = disabled).
Margin to keep below cap so you have salvage headroom.
Generate supplies up to this percent of max cargo capacity as decimal. 0.35 = 35 percent of cargo space.
Hard limit on supply generation regardless of cargo space. 0 = no hard limit. Prevents filling smaller cargo holds entirely with supplies.
[extra] = use crew over fleet minimum; [all] = use all crew; [nocrew] = don't use crew for calculation
Amount of supplies each crew member generates per day (decimal or integer).
When crew usage is set to [nocrew]: [percent] = percentage of max cargo per day; [flat] = flat supplies per day
Value for percent or flat rate generation when not using crew. For percent mode: 0.1 = 10 percent of cargo per day.
